name: EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL II, L.P., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection and Chest Township, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Eagle Environmental II, L.P. v. Commonwealth

parties: EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL II, L.P., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection and Chest Township, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of November, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. It is further ordered that the matter be CONSOLIDATED with Tri-County Industries, Inc., et al. v. Department of Environmental Protection, No. 179 MAL 2003, 575 Pa. 163, 164, 835 A.2d 706, 2003 WL 22681332.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
835 A.2d 707
EAGLE ENVIRONMENTAL II, L.P., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Environmental Protection and Chest Township, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 12, 2003.
